titleInfo.title: Academy of Country Music Celebrates Number 1s

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and black on white) announcing the Academy of Country Music Celebrates Number 1 hits for July - September 2013 including Beat This Summer performed by Brad Paisley, Crash My Party performed by Luke Bryan, Done performed by the Band Perry, Don't Ya performed by Brett Eldridge, Hey Pretty Girl performed by Kip Moore, I Want Crazy performed by Hunter Hayes, Little Bit of Everything performed by Keith Urban, Night Tain performed by Jason Aldean, Point At You performed by Justin Moore, Running' Outta Moonlight performed by Randy Houser, Round Here performed by the Florida Georgia Line, and See You Again performed by Carrie Underwood.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
